title: Global rice prices rise a tad, but trend may change soon on surplus supplies
description:
Rice prices in the global market have increased marginally in the past couple of weeks, but the trend is unlikely to continue in view of surplus supplies, trade sources said.

Moreover, there is a temporary setback to Indian shipments to Senegal as importers’ licences in the African nation have expi...

title: Senegal's rebased GDP boosts GDP by 13.5%
description: In a significant move to better reflect its economic reality, Senegal has announced the recalculation of its Gross Domestic Product (GDP) using a new base year of 2021. This adjustment increases the nation's 2021 GDP figure to 17.3 trillion CFA francs, up by 13.5%, and revises its public debt-to-GDP...
